Class projectManager

java.lang.Object
projectManager
public class projectManager extends Object
Class with main loop and methods that utilises the Project and person class

  • Constructor Details

    • projectManager

      public projectManager()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main loop allows user to view or add a project. When a user chooses to view a project a list of projects is presented to the user. When the user selects a project from the list they have the option to edit certain attributes of the project. When a user chooses to add a project they will be asked to input all necessary information for the creation of a Project() object.
      Parameters:
      args - Console Arguments

    • searchProject

      private static Project searchProject(Scanner input, List<Project> allProjects)
      The method searches for a project by name or number
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner to be used for input.
      allProjects - Array of project objects to search through
      Returns:
      project The project found through search

    • processProject

      private static void processProject(Scanner input, Project project)
      The method allows the user to edit a chosen project and allows then to change a range of attributes of the project
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner to be used for input.
      project - Project object to be edited

    • changePersonContacts

      private static void changePersonContacts(Scanner input, Person person)
      The method allows the user to edit the contact details of the contractor of the project
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner to be used for input.
      person - Person object to be edited

    • changeAmountPaid

      private static void changeAmountPaid(Scanner input, Project project)
      The method allows the user to edit the amount paid of the project
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner to be used for input.
      project - Project object to be edited

    • changeDueDate

      private static String changeDueDate(Scanner input)
      The method allows the user to edit the deadline of the project
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner to be used for input.
      Returns:
      deadline New deadline in LocalDate format.

    • createProject

      public static Project createProject()
      The method requests all necessary information from the user to create a project object.
      Returns:
      newly created Project object

      This method allows you to create a person object.
      Parameters:
